VISITOR: Any and all users of the website, in any form and by any means, who access the company's website or platform via computer, notebook, tablet, cell phone or any other means.

 

NAVIGATION: The act of visiting pages and content on the company's website or platform.

LOGIN: Visitor access data when registering with the COMPANY, divided between username and password, which gives access to restricted functions of the website.

 

HYPERLINKS: These are clickable links that may appear on the website or in the content, which lead to another COMPANY page or external website.

Este termo pode conter algumas palavras específicas que podem não ser de conhecimento geral. Entre elas:
